name: The Boomerang Sword In The Season Forest
name_original: The Boomerang Sword In The Season Forest
description:
A game mady by "Delt@h" for the MiniJam 4th Edition.

Collect coins by killing the enemy slimes in a randomly generated level.

When you've collected 100 coins, look for the "Blinking" tresure!

If you touch a slime, you lose 10 coins & go back to start.

Movement: Arrow keys

Attack: "Z"

Restart game:  "R"

Quit game: "Esc"
